SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Thanks heaps for joining me on Diva Channel
today, loves! As always, our program's brought
to you by the Royal Broadcasting Foundation.
I've been your Songstress—cheers!

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Producer
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Another cracking good program,
Songstress—right cracking indeed!
But I'm thinking maybe it wouldn't hurt
to start shaking things up just a whit?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Aye, I've been considering that myself lately,
and couldn't agree more. I mean, it's my job
to keep our listeners entertained, after all.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Producer
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Sounds like you've something brilliant in mind.
Well, I'm dead chuffed to hear it—dead chuffed,
I say! I only wish the rest of the talent took their
jobs as seriously as you.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.text: Oh, go on! Right then, best be off.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.text:
I say, the producer seemed quite pleased
with you today! So what's next, mmm?
Off to the museum again?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Aye, but first I need to
stop off at Canuds.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Going shopping? That's unlike you.
Watch you don't get mobbed.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_01.speaker: Fan_Mother
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_01.text:
What are you doing?
Stop it this instant!

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_02.speaker: Fan_Utahime
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_02.text:
Hey there, Songstress!
Fancy a dance battle, eh?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.text:
Oh, but that'd be magic!
Ready? One, two, three, four!

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.text:
You were pure dead brilliant, child!
Might even be better than me.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.speaker: Fan_Utahime
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.text: Hee hee! Best keep practicing, then!

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_07.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_07.text: Aye, I will. Cheers for the dance!

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_00.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_00.text:
Well, you certainly made his day.
Bit over the top though, yeah?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_01.text:
Heh heh. You know I'm not programmed
for flattery—everything I say comes straight
from the heart, so it does.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_02.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_02.text: We'll be at the museum soon.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_03.text:
Their music library's big as anything.
I could listen every day and never
run out of new things to hear!

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_04.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_04.text:
Yes, but aren't you also capable of
importing and processing all of its
data within seconds?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_05.text:
Music's more than data, love!
If ye dinnae listen in real time,
what's the point?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_06.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_06.text:
Well, just don't listen for so long
that you miss your next broadcast.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_08.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_08.text: Should I arrange a car for you?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_09.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_09.text: Nae, it'll be faster to run.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_00.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_00.text:
Ah, I see you've come to visit
us again today. Welcome.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_02.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_02.text:
We're closed to the public at the moment,
so you can simply relax and enjoy yourself
to your heart's content.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_040_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_040_00.text:
Lately, I've been listening to music at the Royal Museum.
They've got tunes from the world over and all recorded
history, so I'd like to share a little surprise with ye on
the show today.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_040_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_040_01.text:
Today, I'll be singing something a wee bit
different: an a cappella number I found at
the museum that's just tidy as anything.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_040_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_040_02.text:
I dinnae even know the title,
but I know ye're gonna adore it.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_040_04.speaker: Producer
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_040_04.text:
That's a forbidden composition!
How could you let this happen!?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_040_05.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_040_05.text: Don't go blaming me for this!

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_050_00.speaker: Producer
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_050_00.text:
Right then! There's now data of forbidden
music in your memory banks, so we've got no
choice but to up and seal the whole mess off.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_050_01.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_050_01.text:
Could we not simply delete that
one piece of problematic data?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_050_02.speaker: Producer
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_050_02.text:
'Just delete it'? What rubbish! That's chopping
up her brain, and I won't hear of it—unless
you're the type what happily goes rooting
around with a scalpel in your own noggin!?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_050_04.speaker: Producer
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_050_04.text:
We'll block her memory so she can't access the
forbidden song. It will affect a good bit of her
abilities, but she'll maintain the basic functions
necessary for getting by.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_050_05.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_050_05.text:
Er, but does that not sound so much
worse than simply deleting it?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_050_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_050_06.text: Will I still be able to sing?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_050_07.speaker: Producer
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_050_07.text:
Good heavens, no!
Your career is finished.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_060_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_060_01.text:
My serial number is D05-72314.
I am known as Songstress Diva No. 5.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_060_02.speaker: Producer
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_060_02.text:
A songstress, is it? Well then, sing
me something nice! Saaay, the Albion
national anthem, perhaps?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_060_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_060_03.text:
Error. I know the lyrics, but I cannae
access the musical score. Error.
I dinnae know how to sing.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_060_04.speaker: Producer
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_060_04.text: Well! That's that, neat as a pin.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_060_07.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_060_07.text: Blimey, has she forgotten me as well?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_070_02.speaker: Fan_Utahime
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_070_02.text:
What's wrong with her, Mum!?
I'm scared!

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_070_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_070_05.text: I cannae stay in this body.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_080_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_080_00.text:
Sorry, love, but I need
to borrow your body.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_090_02.speaker: Museum_Director
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_090_02.text:
Are you daft? I said we're closed!
What manner of worthless robot doesn't
understand such a basic statement?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_100_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_100_00.text:
I dinnae know what I should
do with myself now.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_100_01.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_100_01.text: Ah, here you are! What luck!

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_100_03.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_100_03.text:
Who I am doesn't matter—but I'll introduce
myself anyway! The name is Constantine, and
I command Albion's National Extradimensional
Exploratory Task Force.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_100_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_100_04.text:
That dinnae seem to have
much to do with me.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_100_05.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_100_05.text:
Except you have been selected to serve on said
task force! You've been worrying over what to do
with yourself, yes? Well now you can go exploring
with all of us! Isn't that just smashing?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_100_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_100_06.text:
Aye, it seems I've no other choices
in my life, so cheers for having me.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_100_07.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_100_07.text:
Excellent! We'll set off as soon as I
introduce you to the rest of the force.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_00.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_00.text:
Right then! Introductions. I am Constantine,
commander of Albion's National Extradimensional
Exploratory Task Force, and I'm chuffed to have
been entrusted by the queen herself with this!

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_01.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_01.text: This is Imakoo. He's a werewolf.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_02.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_02.text:
Don't worry now! He's quite the
friendly chap, despite appearances.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_03.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_03.text:
This is Boudica, a very talented warrior.
She ran into a bit of a row with the royal
palace and...let's leave it at that.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_04.speaker: Boudica
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_04.text:
And what's that got to do
with the price of tea?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_06.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_06.text:
Next to her is Bláth—quite the lovely
little flower, don't you think?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_08.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_08.text:
Is that right? Well, I'm sure we're
all quite looking forward to it.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_09.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_09.text:
And finally... Ah yes! Wednesday.
Er, is that what we should call you?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_10.speaker: Wednesday
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_10.text:
Call me Friday! ...But that's not my name.
So call me Tuesday! ...But that's not my name. 
So call me Sunday! ...But that's not my name.
So call me Wednesday!

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_11.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_11.text:
And then we have you.
What's your name, dear?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_12.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_12.text:
My serial number is D05-72314.
I'm known as Songstress Diva No. 5.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_13.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_110_13.text:
Well then! Now that we're all friends,
let's make to depart at once.

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_02.speaker: UI
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_02.text: Experience this from the start again?

SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_03.speaker: UI
SUB_W09_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_100_CUT_000_03.text: Jump right into your Conjoined Worlds journey.
